bigraph.evaluation package¶

Submodules¶

bigraph.evaluation.evaluation module¶

bigraph.evaluation.evaluation.evaluate(G: object, k: int = 2, method: str = 'all')¶

Evaluation interface for evaluating algorithms

Parameters

  • G -- Networkx bipartite graph

  • k -- Number of folds (used in KFold)

  • method -- Algorithm name

Returns

Calculated metrics: overall_precision, overall_auc, fpr_algo, tpr_algo

bigraph.evaluation.evaluation.plot_ROC(fpr: list, tpr: list, met: str)¶

Plot ROC curve for algorithms

Parameters

  • fpr -- *type: list - False positive rate metric

  • tpr -- *type: list - True positive rate metric

  • met -- Metric

Returns

True on success
